document_data.name: Lahumbra Sashtyn
document_data.mainbody: '''Lahumbra Sashtyn''' was a crazed warrior and [[adventurer]] inhabiting [[Yhaunn]] in [[1358 DR]].
document_data.Activities: Lahumbra loved to fight. If she couldn't get her fighting fix on dangerous and reckless adventures, then she went down to the docks to to thrash fellow adventurers or tumbled with the city watch just for the fun of it. Though she had countless injuries from her exploits, all of them had been healed by mysterious magical means.
document_data.History: In [[Eleasis]] of the {{YearlinkName|1373}}, she was arm-wrestling at the [[Cutter's Dip]] tavern, and helped [[Stag (bandit)|Stag]] and [[Drik]] torment the [[Selûne|Selûnite]] [[werewolf]] [[priestess]] [[Feena Archwood]] until she was rescued by the [[Shar|Sharran]] cultist [[Keph Thingoleir]].
